name: mern-bug-tracker
description: A comprehensive bug tracking application with testing and debugging

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:unit: concurrently "cd server && npm run test:unit" "cd client && npm run test:unit"
scripts.test:integration: concurrently "cd server && npm run test:integration" "cd client && npm run test:integration"
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'E2E tests skipped - Cypress not installed'
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "cd server && npm run test:coverage" "cd client && npm run test:coverage"
